name: Saving Pluto
description:
Saving Pluto is a simple randomly generated 3D video game created by Guanqing Lin on Apr 2017. The purpose of this game is to take the spaceship to find Pluto in the space. Once the player is hit by a rock in the space, the scene will randomly generate and need to restart to find the Pluto. 

Instructions:
-Use 1440 x 900 to play the game;
-Press Space to Start the Game;
-Press WASD to control/Space to Jump;
-Press R to Restart and Q to Quit;
-Put on the headphone.
